website_summaries.verdict: Goats are not common plush toy characters, but Junkyard Jeff has a special appeal to all ages and genders. Adults will also enjoy his conversion from nice to naughty.
pros: Billy goat character appealing to both boys and girls
cons: Some mechanical issues with mouth reported
Conversion from nice to feisty can be too intense

customer_reviews.title: Always gets a laugh
customer_reviews.text: I love junkyard Jeff (goat) I got him because he looks more evil with his horns. I love showing him off to friends. They all want one now. My cats don't know what to think. They know his face changes and they don't like it. Anyone who loves a gang gift definitely needs one.
customer_reviews.author: mandaozz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable plush toy with a fierce side
customer_reviews.text: The Feisty Pets may have started out as a funny gimmick, but they're hilariously adorable. They look like an absolutely adorable plush toy... but if you squeeze them in a certain spot, they bare fangs and snarl at you! Perhaps not the best gift for a very small or sensitive child, but kids with a sense of humor and a fondness for fierce things -- or adults with a silly side -- will get a kick out of them. And they're very soft and nice to cuddle as well... provided you don't mind your cuddly creatures having a bit of a bite to them...
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Starflight

customer_reviews.title: I own real goats and just fell in love with this guy
customer_reviews.text: I own real goats and just fell in love with this guy. I bought it and another similar toy for my nieces and inlaws. The inlaws and parents don't share my sense of humor so I got them both back lol (it's funny because my youngest niece actually had fun playign with it in spite of her mother's disaproval!) Anyway no complaints lol not my fault people don't know how to laugh. Happy to have this and the other one in my stuffy collection!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Regrets

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller and cheaper looking than anticipated, you can see through the fur to the fabric (like a carnival prize). But still cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these as gifts for like EVERYONE on Christmas, I got like every character and they were a big hit. Super cute/creepy, I gave my 1 year old the bear and he is absolutely in LOVE with it! He will pick it up and like growl at you when he wants you to make the bear have a mean face and everyone thought I was crazy for giving it to a baby because "it's scary, omg" but my kid adores it so much, he will carry it around and go to sleep with it! Great quality, awesome and unique gifts! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MommyTo2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to use for special needs children.
customer_reviews.text: This fury guy is a hoot! He is exactly as described only better. I actually bought him as a tool to use in a special needs classroom. When certain children cannot express their heightened level, this little guy is a great tool and fun for any child to express how they are feeling when words are not available to them, at that moment. He bears his teeth, just as pictured.....When you squeeze the back of his head. Easy for ant child or adult to do.
customer_reviews.author: CB in Nh

customer_reviews.title: As expected and hilarious
customer_reviews.text: The plush is very cute and very funny. I ordered on impulse for an adult. I have seen them all over since then in kids departments, but am hoping that she hasn’t seen this before so there will still be a surprise. I was slightly concerned that I would receive the version with a tongue instead of pointy teeth, but fortunately he arrived with teeth. The plush is decent quality for the price and seems like he would hold up to being carried around and used as a puppet regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Every couple days he'll be like 'HEY look at this' and laugh hysterically as he ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is obsessed with this goat. Every couple days he'll be like 'HEY look at this' and laugh hysterically as he makes the goat snarl. It's been like 2 months and it's still funny. In fact it gets funnier every time because my boyfriend just never gets tired of it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute For a Boy
customer_reviews.text: My son has grown past the any stuff animal phase and loves these as they are more boyish. They look cute at first but then you see the teeth and the mean eyes. It isn't in any plastic nor box which sucks. The only thing showing it is new, is there is a tag still attached.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this critter as a gift to a goat-loving 7 year-old, and she absolutely loves it! The stuffed animal works exactly as described - just squeeze the back of the head and his expression goes from benign to fierce. While 7 might be a little young, this child has a great sense of humor and wasn't frightened by it at all. I think that it's so stinkin' funny that I may get one for myself, LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Feisty Pets William Mark Junkyarde Jeff Adorable Plush Stuffed Goat That Turns Feisty with a Squeeze
